content.purpose: These terms are established to regulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the company and members regarding the use of services provided by FairWork (hereinafter referred to as the "Company"), and other necessary matters.
content.definitions:
1. "Service" means all services provided by the Company.
2. "Member" means a customer who accesses the Company's service and enters into a usage agreement with the Company in accordance with these terms and uses the services provided by the Company.
3. "Account" means a combination of characters, numbers, or special characters selected by the member and approved by the Company for member identification and service use.
content.effectiveness:
1. These terms take effect for all members who wish to use the service.
2. The Company may change these terms within the scope not violating relevant laws and regulations when necessary.
3. When the Company changes the terms, it will notify the current terms along with the application date and reason for change on the service initial screen 7 days before the application date.
content.service:
1. The Company provides the following services:
- Foreign worker related information provision
- Visa application and management services
- Contract analysis and review services
- Other services determined by the Company
2. Services are provided 24 hours a day, 365 days a year as a principle.
content.suspension:
1. The Company may temporarily suspend service provision when there are reasons such as maintenance, replacement, and failure of information and communication equipment such as computers, and communication interruption.
2. The Company compensates for damages suffered by members or third parties due to temporary suspension of service provision due to the reasons in paragraph 1. However, this does not apply when the Company proves that there was no intention or negligence.
content.registration:
1. Members apply for membership by filling out member information according to the registration form set by the Company and expressing their intention to agree to these terms.
2. The Company registers as a member among users who have applied for membership as described in paragraph 1, unless they fall under any of the following items.
content.withdrawal:
1. Members may request withdrawal from the Company at any time, and the Company processes member withdrawal immediately.
2. When a member falls under any of the following reasons, the Company may restrict and suspend member qualifications.
content.memberObligations:
1. Members must comply with relevant laws and regulations, the provisions of these terms, usage guidelines and precautions announced on the service, matters notified by the Company, etc., and must not engage in acts that interfere with the Company's business.
2. Members must not engage in the following acts related to service use.
content.companyObligations:
1. The Company does not engage in acts prohibited by relevant laws and regulations and these terms or contrary to public order and morals, and strives to provide services continuously and stably in accordance with these terms.
2. The Company builds a security system for protecting members' personal information (including credit information) so that members can safely use internet services.
content.privacy:
1. The Company protects members' personal information in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and the protection and use of personal information follows relevant laws and regulations and the privacy policy set by the Company.
2. However, the Company is not responsible for any information exposed due to the member's fault.
content.supplementary: These terms take effect from January 1, 2025.

sections.retention: 2. Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information
sections.thirdParty: 3. Third Party Provision of Personal Information
sections.rights: 5. Rights, Obligations, and Exercise Methods of Information Subjects
sections.inquiry: 11. Department for Receiving and Processing Personal Information Access Requests

content.purpose:
FairWork (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") processes personal information for the following purposes and does not use it for purposes other than the following:

• Member registration and management
• Service provision and operation
• Customer consultation and inquiry response
• Marketing and advertising utilization
• Service improvement and new service development
content.retention:
The Company processes and retains personal information within the personal information retention and use period under laws and regulations or the personal information retention and use period agreed upon when collecting personal information from information subjects.

• Member registration and management: Until member withdrawal
• Service provision: Until service use termination
• Customer consultation: 3 years after consultation completion
• Marketing: Until consent withdrawal
content.thirdParty:
The Company processes the information subject's personal information only within the scope specified in Article 1 (Purpose of Personal Information Processing) and provides personal information to third parties only in cases corresponding to Articles 17 and 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act, such as the information subject's consent and special provisions of laws.

The Company may provide personal information to third parties in the following cases:
• When separate consent is received from the information subject
• When requested by government agencies based on laws and regulations
• When necessary for statistical compilation and academic research purposes
content.outsourcing:
The Company outsources personal information processing tasks as follows for smooth personal information work processing.

• Outsourced party (consignee): Cloud service provider
• Content of outsourced work: Data storage and management
• Outsourcing period: Service provision period
content.rights:
Users can exercise the following rights as personal information subjects:

• Personal information access request
• Correction request in case of errors
• Deletion request
• Processing suspension request

Rights exercise under paragraph 1 can be made to the Company through written documents, phone, email, facsimile transmission (FAX), etc., and the Company will take action without delay.
content.items:
The Company processes the following personal information items:

• Required items: Email address, password, name
• Optional items: Phone number, address, date of birth
• Automatically collected items: IP address, cookies, service usage records, access logs
content.destruction:
The Company destroys the relevant personal information without delay when personal information becomes unnecessary due to the expiration of the personal information retention period or achievement of the processing purpose.

• Information in electronic file format is processed using technical methods that cannot reproduce records.
• Personal information printed on paper is destroyed by shredding or incineration.
content.security:
The Company takes the following security measures in accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act:

• Encryption of personal information
• Technical measures against hacking
• Access restrictions to personal information
• Minimization and education of personal information handling staff
content.officer:
The Company is responsible for overseeing personal information processing tasks and designates a personal information protection officer as follows for handling information subjects' complaints and damage relief related to personal information processing:

▶ Personal Information Protection Officer
• Name: [Officer Name]
• Position: [Position]
• Contact: [Contact]
• Email: [Email]
content.changes: This Privacy Policy applies from the effective date, and if there are additions, deletions, or corrections to the content due to changes in laws and policies, notice will be given through announcements 7 days before the implementation of the changes.
content.inquiry:
Information subjects can make personal information access requests in accordance with Article 35 of the Personal Information Protection Act to the department below:

▶ Department for Receiving and Processing Personal Information Access Requests
• Department: [Department Name]
• Person in charge: [Person in Charge]
• Contact: [Contact]
• Email: [Email]
content.effectiveDate: This Privacy Policy applies from January 1, 2024.
